remarks: An explicit value for the limit, when the limit exists at a limit point.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ellimciota.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
ellimciota.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ CC ) $.
ellimciota.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( ( limPt ` K ) ` A ) ) $.
ellimciota.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( F limCC B ) =/= (/) ) $.
ellimciota.k $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
ellimciota $p |- ( ph -> ( iota x x e. ( F limCC B ) ) e. ( F limCC B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
$d K x $.
$d ph x $.
